articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Austrian Chancellor
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Austrian Chancellor
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, on Dec. 11 sent a congratulatory message to Werner Faymann upon his appointment as Federal Chancellor of Austria.
					 The message wished him successes in his noble work for prosperity of the country and welfare of the people.

articles.title: Congratulations to Austrian Minister for Europe and Intl' Relations
articles.content:
Congratulations to Austrian Minister for Europe and Intl' Relations
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message to Michael Spindelegger upon his appointment as minister for Europe and International Relations of Austria on Thursday.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop, the message sincerely wished the minister success in his work for the international prestige and interests of the country.

articles.title: Chinese Defence Minister on China-DPRK Cooperation
articles.content:
Chinese Defence Minister on China-DPRK Cooperation
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Col. General Liang Guanglie, minister of National Defense of China, met and had a talk with the delegation of officials for foreign affairs of the Korean People's Army on a visit to China at the August 1 Building in Beijing on December 12.
					 Liang Guanglie said that he, as a veteran of the Chinese People's Volunteers, has warm feelings toward the Korean people. The China-DPRK friendly relations are the relationship sealed in blood between the armies and peoples of the two countries who fought shoulder to shoulder in the periods of the anti-Japanese war, the Chinese civil war for liberation and the Korean war, he added.
					
					 He noted that the Sino-Korean friendly relations have achieved great success in all domains over nearly six decades after the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					
					 He underlined the need to boost exchange and cooperation between the armies true to the intention of the top leaders of the two countries who pay deep attention to the development of the bilateral friendly relations.

articles.title: Youth Shock Brigade Activities Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Youth Shock Brigade Activities Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The youth shock brigade activities have been briskly conducted to make a breakthrough of advance in building an economic power this year.
					Over one million young people taking part in the activities achieved successes in production and construction by their devoted efforts.
					
					Members of the Cha Kwang Su Youth Shock Brigade at the Pyongyang Thermal-Power Complex voluntarily carried out the difficult tasks in overhauling generators and boilers and ensuring their normal operation. Those of the Kim Hyok youth shock brigades at the Chonsong and Sinchang youth coal mines overfulfilled their coal production assignments every month by carrying on continuous drilling and blasting.
					
					Members of the youth shock brigades at the Chollima Steel Complex and the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, who turned out in the projects for modernizing electric furnaces and setting up a large-size oxygen separator, greatly contributed to ensuring their smooth operation by making a breakthrough in such vast work as the disassembling of equipment and ground excavation and concrete tamping.
					
					The members of a youth shock brigade finished the construction of the Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 1 to start the output of electricity.
					
					 The young people have also devoted their patriotic enthusiasm and efforts in projects for constructing such large-scale hydro-power stations as the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, the Wonsan Youth Power Station and the Orangchon Power Station and for building monumental edifices of the era such as the Miru Plain waterways and the reconstruction of Mansudae Street.
					
					 Youth shock brigades for technical innovation were organized and have been operated at many industrial establishments and in cooperative farms. After all, more than one thousand pieces of valuable inventions were produced from among the youth.

articles.title: Facelifted Central Zoo (1)
articles.content:
Facelifted Central Zoo (1)
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Zoo located at the foot of picturesque Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang is visited by a stream of people.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who gave on-spot guidance to the Central Zoo reconstructed on an expansion basis some time ago, said that it is the pride of the Korean people to have a large modern zoo.
					
					 The zoo covers an area of more than 100 hectares.
					
					 Over sixty animal sheds including the aquarium, tiger, bear and horse sheds have been arranged in harmony with the surrounding scenery while providing circumstances like the habitats of animals and have full conditions for tending in time and breeding young animals.
					
					 The open-air playgrounds were broadened in a rational way to suit the features of animals living in the natural world and ditches were dug around them. In particular, an elevated bridge was built over the margin of the beast sheds so that visitors may see beasts more clearly.
					
					 The upper parts of the bird cages were widened and glass walls were installed in the animal sheds for the convenience of the zoo-goers.
					
					 The aquarium was also built in accordance with the ecological features of rare fishes, equipped with the advanced facilities including filter.
					
					 As a result, the number of visitors is increasing even in winter.

articles.title: National Food Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
National Food Encouraged in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- National food is encouraged in the DPRK.
					 All public catering establishments of the country serve quality national dishes to customers according to seasons, thus adding luster to the traditions of national food. 
					
					 In order to increase the assortment of national food and improve its quality, the Korean Cook Association holds local special food exhibition, cooking festival and short course. And the Ministry of Commerce sponsors national food show and contest and the like with city, county and ri as a unit to discover local original dishes without exception and strives in every way to standardize and put the cooking method of the national food on a scientific basis. 
					
					 The Changgwang Public Service Management Bureau held a potato food show where over 200 kinds of potato dishes including boiled rice made with potato and five grains, potato dish seasoned with soysauce and rice hash mixed with potato and vegetables were presented to delight the visitors.
					
					 The Chongchun, Ryonmot, Songyo, Chilgol Folk Restaurants and other public catering centres in the capital serve national dishes including Pyongyang onban, one of the four famous dishes of Pyongyang, catfish soup, rice cake soup, cake made of rice flour and wormwood paste and other tasty and high nutritive national foods. 
					
					 The newly reconstructed Okryu Restaurant has improved the quality of the Pyongyang cold noodle to delight visitors.
					
					The national food restaurants in the Minsok (folklore) Street of Sariwon and restaurants in all provinces are always crowded with customers for their national dishes such as sweet rice dish, bean paste soup, rice hash, loach soup, beef with vegetables cooked in casserole and green gram pancake.

articles.title: U.S. Stepped-up Arms Buildup Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. Stepped-up Arms Buildup Assailed
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are mulling the deployment of three squadrons of F-22 in the Asia-Pacific region. Global Hawk will reportedly be deployed in the U.S. Air Force base on Guam soon. The U.S. Air Force is planning to deploy B-1, B-2 and B-52s on Guam on a rotation basis.
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. military in massively deploying ultra-modern strategic attack means in its bases in the Asia-Pacific region with the Korean Peninsula as an operation theatre is to carry out its strategy for a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK and its neighboring countries by bolstering air task force in the region.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about realizing the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula through dialogue but it is, in actually, seeking a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK and accelerating the arms buildup in preparation for it behind the scene of dialogue.
					
					 Its moves for arms buildup for aggression are unpardonable criminal acts as they are beclouding the prospect of solving the nuclear issue on the peninsula, escalating its military showdown and tension and driving the situation to the brink of a war. This goes to prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal standing in the way of realizing the denuclearization of the peninsula and bringing the danger of another Korean war.
					
					 The Korean people will boost their self-reliant war deterrent under the uplifted banner of Songun to cope with the U.S. bellicose forces' evermore undisguised moves for a war of aggression and frustrate any provocation of the enemies with a strong counteraction.
					
					 The U.S. war-like forces would be well advised to behave themselves, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their reckless arms buildup.

articles.title: Treacherous Remarks of Lee Myung Bak Rebuffed
articles.content:
Treacherous Remarks of Lee Myung Bak Rebuffed 
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, when meeting with Nakasone, former prime minister of Japan, recently, jabbered he "sympathizes" with Japan in its efforts to seek a solution to the abduction issue and would make efforts for it and promised what he called "joint action" and "cooperation".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					What he uttered fully discloses his treacherous intention to encourage the Japanese reactionaries in their wild ambition to use the abduction issue as a lever for tightening the sanctions against the DPRK and increasing the pressure upon it and to do harm to the DPRK in league with them.
					
					 Lee's zealous involvement in the criminal moves of the Japanese reactionaries to harm and stifle Koreans bespeaks that he has become a despicable guy who is so hell-bent on acts of treachery that he is utterly indifferent to compatriots and the destiny of the nation.
					
					 His demeanor is a continuation of the submissive and treacherous acts perpetrated by him during his visit to Japan. This clearly indicates that his sycophantic tendency towards Japan and nature as a traitor will never change.
					
					The recent outbursts let loose by Lee are nothing but a sort of declaration of confrontation as they are intended to unlimitedly escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with his Japanese master.
					
					 His plight is so wretched that he is unable to prolong his remaining days without clinging to the coattail of such political pigmy as Japan. Therefore, his treacherous remarks are nothing but a dirge heralding his ruin.
					
					 Only a stern judgment by history and people awaits Lee as he is no more than a cancer-like being betraying the nation and standing in the way of national reunification as a lackey of foreign forces.

articles.title: Prospect of Inter-Korean Relations Entirely Depends on Behavior of Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
Prospect of Inter-Korean Relations Entirely Depends on Behavior of Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- So Jae Jin, director of the Institute for Unification Studies of south Korea, blustered that the "south-north relations are festering not due to the south side's government but due to the north's tactics to spark a crisis," while describing the crucial measure taken by the north side to strictly restrict and suspend all overland passages through the Military Demarcation Line as "tactics to deliberately throw a hurdle in the south-north relations".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday observes:
					
					 What So uttered finding fault with the other reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 As for So, he is a confrontational fanatic as he took the lead in shaping Lee Myung Bak's "policy toward the north" called "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars."
					
					 Ultra-right conservatives including So, authors of the above-said policy, are driven into a tight corner at home and abroad as the inter-Korean relations are put to a stalemate. That is why So is letting loose nonsensical remarks to divert elsewhere the public criticism of them.
					
					 The north-south relations are going from bad to worse due to such disgusting guys who find fault with others to serve their immediate purpose in utter disregard of the nation.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, had So and other like-minded guys not shaped the "policy toward the north" aimed at stoking confrontation with fellow countrymen under the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", the north-south relations would not have reached the present worst phase. It has become clear that the inter-Korean relations can never improve as long as Lee Myung Bak keeps such anti-reunification elements as So in office.
					
					 The prospect of the north-south relations entirely depends on the south Korean authorities' behavior.

articles.title: Respect for Independence Called for
articles.content:
Respect for Independence Called for
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- To maintain independence is one of the fundamental principles to be abided by to establish fair international relations. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					If fair international relations are to be established and developed, it is necessary to protect independence and respect it to ensure that all countries and nations protect and meet their interests and requirements, the article observes, and goes on:
					
					 Only when countries and nations firmly maintain independence can they settle all the problems arising in the international relations in their interests and in the interests common to humankind. It is the way of exalting the dignity and honor of the nation to maintain independence.
					
					Any country unable to adhere to independence and pursue an independent foreign policy, though it has sovereignty and territory, cannot claim to be a sovereign state, in fact.
					
					All countries are interested in the development of the international relations and the world civilization as equal members of the international community. Respect for sovereignty provides a basic guarantee for the independence, peace and development of the world.
					
					 It is possible for all the countries and people to establish the relations of good neighborliness and friendship and achieve common prosperity and development irrespective of ideology and system only when they stand for abiding by the principle of respect for sovereignty.
					
					 It is the consistent foreign policy stand and principle of the DPRK to establish and boost the relations of good neighborliness and friendship and cooperation with all the countries that respect its sovereignty. The strong political and military potentials the Workers' Party and people of the DPRK have built by thoroughly implementing the revolutionary line of independence provide a sure guarantee for safeguarding the country's sovereignty and the gains of the revolution, successfully pushing forward the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and frustrating the imperialists' moves for aggression and intervention.
					
					 The DPRK's principled and fair and aboveboard stand and attitude calling for the development of the international relations based on respect for sovereignty are putting spurs to establishing sound international relations and ensuring world peace and stability and achieving prosperity and progress.
					
					 The DPRK will make positive efforts to establish and develop the fair international relations on the principle of independence in keeping with the requirement and trend of the present times and thus contribute to the cause of global independence and peace of humankind, concludes the article.

articles.title: International Unity and Solidarity Called for
articles.content:
International Unity and Solidarity Called for
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Unity of world independent forces provides a sure guarantee for foiling the imperialists' policy for aggression and their moves for hegemony, and successfully achieving the cause of global independence, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					Urging the need for all anti-imperialist and independent forces to unite more firmly than ever before now that the imperialists are standing up against the popular masses' cause for independence, the socialist cause in collusion with each other as a coalition force, the article goes on:
					
					 Independence is the basis of international unity and relations.
					
					 There may be differing ideology and system among the elements that make up the anti-imperialist and independent forces such as the socialist movement, the movement for the liberation of colonial nations, the non-aligned movement and the movement for defending peace, etc. But all of them have the common desire for independence.
					
					 The strategy of international unity based on independence serves as an invincible weapon and an eternal banner to be held aloft by the world anti-imperialist and independent forces.
					
					 The imperialists are still working hard to foster contradiction, jealousy and discord among the above-said forces and pit them against themselves by splitting and estranging them from each other, chanting the reactionary slogan "divide and rule".
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the anti-imperialist and independent forces should frustrate all moves of the imperialists to divide and estrange them from each other and achieve firm unity irrespective of ideology, system and religious belief.
					
					 "Let world people advocating independence unite!" This is the slogan for international unity to be put up by all progressives of the world today.
					
					The Korean people will make positive efforts to boost international unity and solidarity with all peoples of the world advocating independence, regarding the unity as a lifeline of the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Stages War Exercises in Forefront Areas
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army Stages War Exercises in Forefront Areas
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet army are getting evermore frantic in the war exercises targeted against the DPRK these days, according to a military source.
					They deployed units of tanks, 227mm multiple rocket launchers and 105mm artillery pieces in the area of Phaju City near the demilitarized zone in the wake of hurling hundreds of fully armed troops into the area of Ryonchon County on Dec. 10, thus fanning up war atmosphere.
					
					155mm artillery units of the puppet army deployed in the above-said area on Dec. 10 fired more than 40 shells in the direction of the Military Demarcation Line. 105mm artillery units deployed in the area of Cholwon County of south Korean Kangwon Province on Dec. 11 fired at least 200 shells at random.
					
					After occupying their combat positions in Phaju City and the area of Cholwon County of south Korean Kangwon Province on Dec. 10 and 11  many armed hooligans of the puppet army staged madcap exercises under the simulated conditions of an offensive operation against the DPRK, frantically firing more than 26,000 large-caliber machine gun and automatic rifle bullets.
					
					 On Dec. 9 hundreds of "commando units" of the puppet army conducted a war maneuver under the simulated conditions of carrying out observation, reconnaissance, assault, destruction and sabotage operations against strategic and tactical targets of the DPRK after intruding into their operational theatres.
					
					 Formations of helicopter gunships and fighters of the puppet army were busy with drills for striking targets, providing close air support and airlifting after flying into the air above the areas of Cholwon County and Hwachon County, south Korean Kangwon Province on Dec. 11 and 12.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Undemocratic Moves Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Undemocratic Moves Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Members of organizations of different circles including the south Korean People's Council for Public Welfare and Democracy held a press conference in Seoul on December 10 at which they declared that they would launch a struggle to check the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to institute undemocratic laws.
					 A declaration issued at the press conference deplored that the successes the martyrs achieved in their struggle for democracy at the cost of sweat and blood for the last several decades were brought to naught just in several months after Lee's seizure of power.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the Lee regime is working hard to build a system for suppressing the people for the sake of the privileged circle which accounts just for one percent, it noted.
					
					The declaration accused "Chongwadae" and the "Grand National Party" of seeking to railroad through the "National Assembly" the "bill for revising the law on assembly and demonstration", the "bill on the revision of the law on the National Intelligence Service", "the bill for revising the law on protecting communication secrets" and the "bill on dissolving and merging committees related to settling the past history" and others.
					
					If these undemocratic laws of Lee are passed, all the people will be subject to observation and control as "criminals" and this land will turn into a society where terror prevails and people are forced to keep silent, the declaration lamented, and continued:
					
					 The danger and gravity of the moves to institute evil laws lie in that Lee seeks to justify observation, control and suppression of people by the force of legislation and system.
					
					  It stressed that people from all walks of life would struggle in unity to put an end to the "government's" suppression under the pretext of "security" and the moves to institute undemocratic laws.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities Urged to Make Switchover in Their Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities Urged to Make Switchover in Their Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Experts on unification issues in south Korea urged the puppet authorities on Dec. 11 to make a radical switchover in their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 They asserted that the inter-Korean relations are now inching close to collapse due to the "policy toward the north" of the present "government" which created extreme confrontation, refusing to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and pulling up someone over the "human rights issue."
					
					 They accused the authorities including Lee Myung Bak of pushing the inter-Korean relations to a more serious crisis with provocative outbursts.
					
					 Asserting that there should be a radical switchover in the above-said policy for the future of the Korean Peninsula, they demanded the authorities take urgent measures for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: GNP's Moves to Make Retrogressive Revision of Laws on Media Flayed
articles.content:
GNP's Moves to Make Retrogressive Revision of Laws on Media Flayed 
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations including the Democratic Labor Party and the Media Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on December 10 in protest against the moves of the "Grand National Party" to make a retrogressive revision of the laws on media, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 They accused the GNP of advancing a proposal calling for the retrogressive revision of seven laws on media which call for allowing big businesses to operate newspapers and broadcasting services in addition to their own business and own the above-said services, terming it absolutely unacceptable.
					
					 The above-mentioned political parties and organizations charged that to grant the right to operate the broadcasting service to Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo is nothing but a reward to be made to them by the Lee Myung Bak regime for the services rendered by those conservative media for his seizure of power.
					
					 They called upon the people to pool efforts to check the above-said moves and protect media.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Sycophantic and Submissive Moves Slammed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Sycophantic and Submissive Moves Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on December 8 in protest against the sycophantic and submissive moves of the puppet authorities to take a measure for exempting the U.S. forces present in south Korea from taxation.
					 The speakers at the press conference laid bare the facts that the "Office of National Tax Administration" decided not to collect taxes on the income from interest gained by the U.S. forces in south Korea through the illegal accumulation of the funds for their upkeep under the pretext of "official purpose."
					
					 Recalling that the U.S. forces present in south Korea are free with money-lending and tax evasion, not content with diverting the funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces, the money collected from the south Koreans as taxes, to an illegal purpose, they queried is it for "an official purpose." The measure taken by the authorities to exempt the U.S. forces from taxation is nothing but a lever to cover up their illegal acts.
					
					 A press release read out at the press conference declared that the organization would wage a vigorous struggle to force the above-said office to own a legal and political responsibility for its sycophantic and unwarranted decision and check the U.S. forces' illegal acts.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Labor Movement under Fire
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Labor Movement under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on Tuesday condemning the puppet authorities' suppression of its chairman.
					 Recalling that the Seoul Central District Court issued a warrant of arrest for Ri Sok Haeng, chairman of the confederation, on Monday in the wake of the police's arrest of him on Dec. 5, the statement noted this is nothing but politically motivated crackdown intended to incriminate the just struggle of the trade union organization and put it under the noose of suppression.
					
					 It demanded the security authorities stop acting a servant for the dictatorial regime and declare Ri not guilty and set him free at once.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Federation of south Korean Trade Unions, too, issued a statement on Monday in which it termed the suppression of the chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions a shameless act for shifting the responsibility for the crime the present "government" committed by yielding to the U.S. pressure for the import of American beef onto others.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, a seminar on exploits by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and a meeting to explain greatness in Indonesia on Dec. 5 and 6 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display in the venues of the events were books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK who have won victory after victory under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The chairman of the above-said Swedish association said that Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode of socialism and paved the path of building a great prosperous and powerful nation while foiling the maneuvers of the U.S.-led imperialist reactionary forces to stifle the DPRK with its military power.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the DPRK could have powerful military deterrent which guarantees peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and it is shining in the world as a beacon of hope of the world progressive people struggling for socialism and independence, he noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexican institute profoundly explained about the fact that Kim Jong Il opened up a new phase of the development of revolution with his prominent wisdom and outstanding foresight and made a breakthrough for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation by boosting the political and military power of the country in every way.
					
					 He also highly praised the feats of Kim Jong Suk, saying that she safeguarded President Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically and at the risk of her life and brought up Kim Jong Il as the bright star of Mt. Paektu so that the Korean people have been blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Sweden.

articles.title: Comidas nacionales de Corea
articles.content:
Comidas nacionales de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En Corea se da gran atencion a desarrollar los platos nacionales.
					Los organos de servicio gastronomico de todo el pais preparan bien las comidas nacionales segun las  cuatro estaciones contribuyendo asi a mantener las tradiciones de los platos criollos.
					
					Para ampliar la gama de manjares nacionales y elevar su calidad, la Asociacion de Cocineros de Corea organizan la exhibicion de comidas especiales locales, el festival y el cursillo gastronomico y, a su vez, el ministerio de Comercio lleva a efecto la reunion de evaluacion y el concurso de comidas nacionales por unidad de ciudad, distrito y comuna para hallar sin omision las comidas tradicionales de las localidades, cientifizar y estandarizar los metodos culinarios de platos  nacionales.
					
					En la reunion de evaluacion de comidas hechas con Papa patrocinada por la Direccion de Servicios de Changgwang llaman la atencion de los participantes mas de 200 variedades de manjares hechos con papa, entre otros, comida de papa con varios cereales, jangazzi de papa y comida de papa y hortalizas tostadas con aceite.
					
					Los Restaurantes Chongchun, Folklorico de Chilgol, Ryonmot y Songyo y otros establecimientos de servicio gastronomico brindan a los clientes las comidas tradicionales nutritivas y sabrosas, entre otros, el arroz en sopa caliente de Pyongyang que es una de las 4 comidas especiales de esta capital, estofado de siluro, sopa con trotas y Tok de ajenjo.
					
					El Restaurante Okryu remodelado eleva la calidad de fideo en frio de Pyongyang para alegrar a los clientes.
					
					Las cantinas enclavadas en el reparto folklorico de la ciudad de Sariwon y otras de todas las provincias  sirven los platos coreanos, entre otros, Yakbap (arroz glutinoso cocido y condimentado con azucar, datil, castana, pinon y aceite de sesamo), la sopa de pasta de soya, el arroz tostado con aceite, el estofado de locha, especie de guisado de carne con verduras con un poco de caldo y la fritura de lenteja verde.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta disparate antinacional de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta disparate antinacional de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En su reciente encuentro con el ex premier japones Nakasone, el traidor Lee Myung Bak le prometio la supuesta "coordinacion" y "cooperacion" en la solucion del "problema del secuestro" expresando el "consentimiento" con la posicion japonesa sobre este tema y la voluntad de "esforzarse" por resolverlo.
					Comentando tal chisme, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo este sabado la intencion antinacional del traidor Lee de calumniar a la RPDC junto con los reaccionarios japoneses al alentar la ambicion de estos de utilizar el problema del secuestro como medio de sancion y presion contra la RPDC.
					
					La complicidad de Lee con la criminal campana de los reaccionarios japoneses para calumniar y aplastar a los connacionales es una muestra de que a este traidor de pesima calana ya no le importan los compatriotas ni el destino nacional, senala el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Las palabras pronunciadas por el ante Nakasone significan la continuacion de sus acciones humillantes y vendepatrias cometidas durante su estancia en Japon, siendo la clara prueba de que no cambiara nunca su servilismo a Japon y cualidades de vendepatria.
					
					Ademas, constituyen la declaracion de que intensificaria ilimitadamente junto con su amo japones sus maniobras conflictivas contra la RPDC.
					
					!Que miserable es Lee Myung Bak que se pega hasta a ese enano politico (Japon) para mantener su precaria vida! 
					
					Por eso tal disparate de Lee no es mas que la cancion funebre buscando su propio arruinamiento.
					
					Dada la evidencia de que Lee es el ente canceroso que traiciona a la nacion y frena la reunificacion de la patria en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, la historia y el pueblo le condenaran a severas penas.

articles.title: Minju Joson refuta disparate de So Jae Jin
articles.content:
Minju Joson refuta disparate de So Jae Jin
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tomo la importante medida de restringir y bloquear rigurosamente todo el transito terrestre por via de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					Al calificarla de una "tactica para crear obstaculos artificiales en las relaciones Sur-Norte", el presidente del "Instituto de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea, So Jae Jin, dijo que el "empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas no se debe al gobierno surcoreano sino a la tactica del Norte de generar la crisis".
					
					El periodico Minju Joson difundio en su edicion de este sabado un comentario individual interpretando el acto verbal de So como la conducta de un ladron que quiere golpear a la victima del robo.
					
					So Jae Jin es el partidario obsesionado de la confrontacion fratricida que desempeno el papel protagonico en la elaboracion de la "politica sobre el Norte" del regimen de Lee Myung Bak, fundamentada en la teoria de la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3,000 dolares", precisa el comentario y agrega:
					
					Hoy dia, en que las relaciones Norte-Sur quedaron bloqueadas totalmente, las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas como So se hallan bajo la avalancha de criticas dentro y fuera del pais. Para desviarla, So esta inventando y soltando disparates que no pasan de ser graznidos.
					
					Las relaciones intercoreanas siguen empeorandose por culpa de los tipejos de la calana de So que para salir de sus apuros, acusan a otros sin tomar en consideracion el destino nacional.
					
					Francamente dicho, si ellos no hubieran trazado la referida "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter fratricida, las relaciones Norte-Sur no habrian caido en la peor coyuntura como ahora.
					
					Mientras Lee Myung Bak sigue amparando a los elementos opositores a la reunificacion como So, no se mejoraran nunca las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					El porvenir de estas relaciones depende enteramente de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun destaca importancia de unidad internacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun destaca importancia de unidad internacional
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La unidad entre las fuerzas independientes del mundo es la garantia fundamental de la victoria en la lucha por cumplir con exito la causa de la independencia en todo el mundo frustrando la politica de agresion y el dominacionismo del imperialismo.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 13 y continua:
					
					Dado que hoy los imperialistas se oponen mediante la confabulacion y alianza a la causa de independencia y la socialista de las masas populares, todas las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas del mundo deben unirse con mas firmeza.
					
					 La base de la unidad y las relaciones internacionales es precisamente la independencia.
					
					Es que la aspiran todos los componentes de las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas como el movimiento socialista, el de liberacion nacional desde el colonialismo, el de los paises no alineados, el de la defensa de la paz, aunque puede haber diferencias en sus ideologias, ideales y regimenes.
					
					La estrategia de la unidad internacional basada en la independencia es la invencible arma y la bandera eterna que deben tomar firmemente las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas del mundo.
					
					Bajo la reaccionaria consigna de "!Gobernar mediante el separatismo!", los imperialistas recurren hoy tambien a todos los recursos para buscar la pelea entre las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas separandoles y metiendoles cunas a traves de la promocion de discordia, desprecio y discrepancias.
					
					La realidad demuestra que las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas deben unirse firmemente por encima de las diferencias de ideologias, regimenes y creencias religiosas para frustrar tales maniobras separatistas de los imperialistas.
					
					Para ello, es preciso que los pueblos progresistas del mundo levanten en alto hoy la consigna: "!Unios, los pueblos del mundo que defienden la independencia!"
					
					El pueblo coreano, que defiende la independencia tomando con firmeza la unidad por la vida de la causa de independencia antiimperialista, se esforzara dinamicamente por fortalecer la unidad y solidaridad internacionales con todos los pueblos del planeta defensores de la independencia.
